name: NEKOMANCER (Ayzen)
description:
NEKOMANCER is a turn-based 2D strategy game where the player will have to protect the Kingdom of Celestial Nekos from the evil Hoomans.  The Kingdom of Celestial Nekos is notable for having magical cats or the so-called Neko which is the sole reason why power lusting Hoomans are so obsessed with them.

Disclaimer: All sprites in this game are made by yours truly.  This game was developed as a fulfillment for my final project in class.
